basics.title: Hey, I'm Mariano Chouhy
basics.name: Mariano Chouhy
basics.label: Frontend Developer with a unique mix of technical expertise, business insight, and clear communication. I bridge development and product strategy to create intuitive, high-impact solutions.
basics.summary: I'm skilled in TypeScript, Next.js, Node.js, and Tailwind CSS. With a legal background, I bring a unique ability to connect business, product, and technology, ensuring development aligns with real user needs and strategic goals. Strong communication, ownership, and problem-solving define my approach, allowing me to craft intuitive interfaces while bridging the gap between technical and non-technical teams. Passionate about creating scalable, impactful solutions in dynamic environments.

work.summary: As a member of the development team, I focus on crafting the front-end for various platforms including Clau for Agents (FpA), Website, and Unified Admin console. My role involves integrating a suite of tools such as HubSpot, Zapier, Make, along with Flat's internal tools. On a daily basis, I work with TypeScript, Next.js, Node.js, and Tailwind CSS.

I provide legal counsel across criminal, civil, and administrative litigation, conduct comprehensive legal investigations and draft settlements, appeals, and legal documentation for submission to national and international courts, including the European Court of Human Rights, Court of Justiceof the European Union, and Inter-American Court of Human Rights (CIDH).

work.company: Poder Judicial de la Nación Argentina
work.summary: I led a 20-member team, managed workload, drafted resolutions, conducted criminal investigations, and advised judges. Achieved 7 promotions in 8 years. Introduced a jurisprudence search system, reducing errors. Implemented workload distribution system, decreasing case resolution delays. Became youngest Clerk of the Court.

As paralegal, my responsibilities encompass drafting legal documents, conducting legal research, interviewing clients, and monitoring judicial proceedings. Additionally, I provide support to attorneys across various legal domains including civil, commercial, labor, administrative, and criminal proceedings.
Provided personalized skiing instruction to guests of all skill levels, ensuring a safe and enjoyable experience at Buttermilk Mountain. I'm a certified PSIA instructor.
Assisted customers with vehicle rentals, provided excellent customer service, and ensure smooth rental transactions.

education.summary: Master in Criminal Law and Procedural Law.
